name: Doki Doki: The Dark Rainclouds
storyline: The tragedy before the festival happened, but luck (and life) smiles at you this time with a second chance, a smile that slowly becomes almost macabre, in this new story, where will your decisions take you?
summary: Doki Doki: The Dark Rainclouds is a fan mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that delves into a darker and more emotionally profound approach to the original story. In this mod, players explore Sayori's journey from a new perspective, highlighting her inner struggles, hidden thoughts and the challenges she faces in her everyday life.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Seeing Sayori In Hospital!!!!(Part 2)(DDLC The Dark Rainclouds MOD)
